message.body: Hey! So I remembered that you were looking for Game of Thrones episode links. I searched the web and found a few lists on tumblr.com. I left the link in Arrigo's Facebook Messages. One of the better links is by this person called "queen of diamonds" lol, but there's a bunch of others if those don't work for you! Anyway, enjoy browsing but I wouldn't recommend spending too much time on tumblr. People post some weeeird stuff on there, haha. Anyway, enjoy!
Aw. Thanks Sam! I'll definitely look into these!
